Windlord:

Windlord wasn't unable to answer, he also was hurt bad. The 
explosion and the fight against Injustice, nmade him fell in stasis 
while in a desperate attempt to protect Organics, he had run towards 
her. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Wolfblade/ Organics:
>  
> Wolfblade had somehow escaped without injury.  She looked around 
at the changed landscape, at the devastation that abounded.  She 
pushed heself to her feet slowly, in shock over the sheer 
destruction.  She wandered around, aimlessly, until she stumbled 
onto Organics, in stasis lock.  It took a moment to register, but 
she snapped back to reality.
> "Windlord!  Organics is hurt bad!"
> 
> Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus 
Prime/Kup/Darkangel/DeathStar/SharpClaws/Wolfenstein : :
>  
> After realizing that most of the troops didn't escape the blast 
Rodimus turns around. He drives up to the blast site looking for 
injured bots. The cannon was nothing but rubble now.
>  
> Kup follows Rodimus.
>  
> Darkangel and DeathStar had flown up to escape the explosion. They 
came down and landed.
>  
> The four bots transformed to bot mode.
>  
> Kup: So much for the cannon, lads.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: If you can respond do so. Anyone whos walking, help 
the injured.
>  
> Both SharpClaws and Wolfenstein were blown from the site and were 
laying on the outskirts of the battlefield. They were heavily 
damaged. Wolf was still functioning but had fallen into stasis lock. 
SharpClaws would terminate soon.
> 
>
